entry.title: Ukraine Readies Plans to Evacuate Civilians Amid Fighting Near Nuclear Plant
entry.content: Russia has rejected demands to withdraw troops from the Zaporizhzhia facility, where Ukraine says Moscow risks causing a global tragedy.

entry.title: With Western Funds Slow to Arrive, Ukraine Scrapes to Pay Its Soldiers
entry.content: Kyiv is struggling with a yawning gap between the cost of the war and depressed tax revenues in an economy battered by Russia’s invasion.

entry.title: China's Bursting Housing Bubble Compounds Its Economic Woes
entry.content: Home sales and prices are dropping in many cities across the country after rising for years, and the damage is spreading. “We’ve never seen a property market slowdown of this size and severity.”
